actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate May 3, 1978 as "Sun Day," and to direct the Department of Energy to coordinate Federal cooperation and participation in this observation.

summary.text: Designates May 3, 1978, as "Sun Day. Directs the Secretary of the Department of Energy to coordinate the participation of applicable segments of the Federal Government in such "Sun Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate May 3, 1978 as "Sun Day," and to direct the Department of Energy to coordinate Federal cooperation and participation in this observation.
